name: Tumbling Upset
text: You nimbly dodge beneath your opponent, creating an opportunity to upend your foe.
prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Trip, Acrobatics 7 ranks.
benefit: When you succeed at an Acrobatics check to move through an enemyâ€™s space, you can spend a swift action to attempt a trip combat maneuver check against the opponent. Even if you fail this check by 10 or more, you do not fall prone.
normal: If you fail a trip combat maneuver check by 10 or more, you are knocked prone.
